com.lambdaworks.redis

Class RedisConnectionPool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lambdaworks.redis.RedisConnectionPool<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Connection type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    Will be removed in future versions. Use ConnectionPoolSupport.

    @Deprecated
public class RedisConnectionPool<T>
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Connection pool for redis connections.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

        Deprecated. 
        Create a new connection pool
        Parameters:
        redisConnectionProvider - the connection provider
        maxActive - max active connections
        maxIdle - max idle connections
        maxWait - max wait time (ms) for a connection

    • Method Detail

      • allocateConnection

        public T allocateConnection()
        Deprecated. 
        Allocate a connection from the pool. It must be returned using freeConnection (or alternatively call close() on the connection). The connections returned by this method are proxies to the underlying connections.
        Returns:
        a pooled connection.

      • freeConnection

        public void freeConnection(T t)
        Deprecated. 
        Return a connection into the pool.
        Parameters:
        t - the connection.

      • getNumIdle

        public int getNumIdle()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the number of idle connections

      • getNumActive

        public int getNumActive()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the number of active connections.

      • close

        public void close()
        Deprecated. 
        Close the pool and close all idle connections. Active connections won't be closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • getComponentType

        public Class<? extends T> getComponentType()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the component type (pool resource type).
